channel.title: CVE Feed for Hiroaki Miyashita -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hiroaki Miyashita -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-44062|2024-09-15T19:49:00.287Z -- hiroaki%20miyashita -- custom%20field%20template
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hiroaki Miyashita Custom Field Template allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Custom Field Template: from n/a through 2.6.5.
